inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of HIV seropositivity and non-Hodgkin's lymphoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to give informed consent and willingness to comply with all procedures and visit schedule.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active opportunistic infection, excluding Mycobacterium avium complex, requiring antibiotic therapy.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Another prior or current malignancy, excepting curatively treated cervical or basal cell carcinoma.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and was diagnosed with Burkitt's lymphoma. They have undergone treatment for the lymphoma and are currently stable.
